title: Ticket #2687: condor_config_val -dump should have an option to expand all macros
description: When 'condor_config_val -dump' is run it prints out all values with macros un-expanded. This is a good default behavior, but it would be nice to have an option to expand them all as well.
remarks:
2011-Dec-05 14:40:26 by gthain:
Added a new -expand option, which, with -dump, prints out with all macros expanded.
check_ins:
2011-Dec-19 12:20   Check-in [28849]: new -expand option for condor_config_val -dump; update man page and version history item (including correcting gittrac ticket number). ===GT=== #2687 (By Karen Miller )
2011-Dec-05 14:58   Check-in [28586]: Document -expand option to condor_config_val #2687 (By Greg Thain )
2011-Dec-05 14:30   Check-in [28584]: Add -expand option to condor_config_val -dump #2687 (By Greg Thain )
creator: kronenfe
